purpose: To provide a comprehensive toolkit for monitoring AI agents, tracking costs associated with large language models (LLMs), and benchmarking various AI frameworks.
principle: Designed to facilitate seamless integration and interoperability among multiple LLMs and agent frameworks, ensuring that users can effectively manage and evaluate their AI systems.
reusability: The SDK is built with modular components that can be reused across different projects and applications, promoting code efficiency and reducing redundancy.
limitations: As an alpha version, it may have incomplete features, potential bugs, and limited support for certain LLMs and frameworks.
name: agentops
description: Python SDK for AI agent monitoring, LLM cost tracking, benchmarking, and more. Integrates with most LLMs and agent frameworks including OpenAI Agents SDK, CrewAI, Langchain, Autogen, AG2, and CamelAI
